pros: You really get to know a lot of people as a missionary and they help you change your life.
cons: There aren't down sides to serving for the church. They only try to help!

pros: The company has very high standards and abides by great ethical values. Employees can trust things will get done the right way! It is a great environment in which to work with continuos training.
cons: There are not too many chances for progression and work can become monotonous.
